compliant.section: 我們會在您同意或為完成任何交易或提供您請求或授權的產品所必需時，分享您的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subject consent, processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: 例如，當您要求我們與第三方共享內容，如提供付款數據以進行購買時，我們將與處理付款交易或提供其他金融服務的銀行和其他實體共享付款資料，以及防欺詐和減少信用風險。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract, processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party

compliant.section: 此外，我們在研華控制的附屬機構和子公司之間共享個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations are subject to specific rules, including appropriate safeguards

compliant.section: 我們還會將個人資料與供應商或其代理人共享，以實現本聲明中描述的目的。
compliant.legal provisions: Establishes rules for data processing agreements between controllers and processors

non_compliant.section: 廣告商有時會在我們顯示的廣告中包含自己的網路信標（或他們的其他廣告合作夥伴的網路信標），以使他們能夠設置和讀取自己的 Cookie。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency - Data must be processed lawfully, fairly and in a transparent manner in relation to the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state what specific data is collected by these third-party beacons and cookies, the purpose of this data collection, and how users can control or object to this data collection.

non_compliant.section: 此外，研華與第三方廣告公司合作，以幫助提供我們的某些廣告服務，我們也允許其他第三方廣告公司在我們的網站上展示廣告。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent, Right to object - Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous. Data subjects have the right to object to processing of their personal data for direct marketing purposes.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly identify these third-party advertising companies and provide users with the option to opt-out of targeted advertising from these companies. It should also specify the legal basis for processing user data for advertising purposes, such as consent or legitimate interest, and provide instructions on how users can withdraw their consent.

non_compliant.section: 這些第三方可能會在您的設備上放置 Cookie，並收集有關您在網站或在線服務上的網路活動的數據。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation, Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject - Data must be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes. Controllers must take appropriate measures to provide any information relating to processing to the data subject in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should provide specific details about the types of cookies used, the data collected by these cookies, and the purposes for which this data is used. It should also explain how users can manage or delete cookies.

non_compliant.section: 這些公司還可能是 NAI 或 DAA 的成員，這兩個成員都有提供簡單的方式，讓您退出參與公司的廣告定向。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject, Right to object - The controller shall provide information on action taken on a request by the data subject without undue delay. Data subjects have the right to object, on grounds relating to his or her particular situation, at any time to processing of personal data concerning him or her which is based on point (e) or (f) of Article 6(1), including profiling based on those provisions.
non_compliant.amend: While mentioning NAI and DAA is helpful, the policy should provide direct links to these opt-out mechanisms and explain how users can exercise their right to object to data processing for targeted advertising.

non_compliant.section: 在這種情況下，這些公司必須遵守我們的個人資料保護和安全要求，不允許他們將從我們收到的個人資料用於任何其他目的。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Processor's specific obligations, Security of processing - Processing by a processor shall be governed by a contract or other legal act under Union or Member State law. The controller and the processor shall implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should elaborate on the specific data protection and security requirements that these companies are bound by. It should also mention the existence of data processing agreements with these companies and the technical and organizational measures taken to ensure data security.
